title: Wait I got Soulstealer Vayne
body:
Okay so i got soulstealer vayne from a chest yesterday and this has me in a pickle.

A. Why did i get this skin I don't even deserve it wtf
B. I am probably one of the worst Vayne players league has ever seen
C. Everyone now expects me to be a Vayne one trick 

I could just keep playing my regular roles but it would be wasting such a good skin. And soulstealer is one of my favourite skin lines but.
Vayne
Why Vayne
Couldn't I have got hextech annie wtf

How long will it take me to be a good vayne ya reckon?
aaaaggghh

replies.body: or become a vayne main lol
Get 3 skin shards then reroll them.

Sell your account with Soulstealer Vayne, then get lessons from Doublelift.

Jks aside, it took me about 40 games to play just above average with Vayne and even as a player who prefers playing high mechanical or "skill" champs, but I still have more fun and are way better on Jinx, Manamune Varus, Jhin, and somehow Caitlyn even with less practice. She is somewhat harder to learn than most ADCs.

Vayne is kinda the ADC that an assassin mains generally would LIKE to play well, but learning a new ADC isn't anywhere near as fun as say learning champs like Zed, Yasuo, Fizz. If you have mained another ADC, adjusting the play style from one ADC to another doesn't take that long, but to be considered a "good" ADC from playing another role requires SHITLOADS of practice. Like last-hiting without items/runes, figuring out how to orb walk/kite without accidentally cancelling AA because all champs have a different AA timer, and some skins on the same champion change where/what/when AA look like even though it is meant to be the same. Macro stuff like knowing item spikes vs other ADCs, build/skill orders (Vayne now has loads of build orders thanks to double Zeal, new Triforce, Rageblade, and even can go smite Bloodrazer), who and how to 1v1, map pressure/split push scenarios and keeping track of enemies who are carrying pink wards(you aren't point-click TARGETABLE in red sweeper, but you are still visible).

With Vayne, people use dragonslayer skin mostly because it has the smoothest AA animation and is easier to learn orb walking with, so we don't know if Soulstealer Vayne has a more responsive, more fluid AA animation even compared to her base skin which is considered 2nd best for AA fluidity, so I don't know if using the skin to learn these sort of things is better or not.

Or you could just throw out everything I have just said and play her Top, and practice ranged-melee matchups. 
Like a scumbag.
